TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CombinedGeometry extends System.Windows.Media.Geometry
Public NotInheritable Class CombinedGeometry Inherits Geometry
public ref class CombinedGeometry sealed : System::Windows::Media::Geometry

summary.span: Represents a 2-D geometric shape defined by the combination of two objects.

span.span: Represents a 2-D geometric shape defined by the combination of two objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定將如何結合兩個幾何。The property specifies how the two geometries will be combined. 請注意，結合了兩個幾何，因此沒有區域的幾何所指定的區域 (例如) 結合時，便會消失。Note that combines the area specified by two geometries, so geometries that do not have area (such as ) disappear when combined. 幾何可以結合數種方式： 使用，則，或有方法類別。Geometries can be combined in several ways: using a , a , or the method of the class. - A從一或多個建立的複合幾何物件。A creates a composite geometry from one or more objects. - A會使用指定的布林運算結合兩個所述的區域物件。A uses a specified boolean operation to combine the area described by two objects. - 靜態方法類別的行為完全相同的方式為物件。The static method of the class behaves in exactly the same manner as the object. 使用時，應該牽涉到仔細思考執行聯集，因為它可以是非常耗費 CPU 資源。Careful thought should be involved when using a to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive. 在大部分情況下，或好的效果。In most cases, a or will work better. 使用只任何時則適用下列步驟：Use a only when any of the following apply: - 幾何作業不是等位。The geometric operation is not a union. - 在幾何必須的值和幾何是自我交集 (也就是實際上很重要)。Either of the geometries have a value of and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the actually matters). - 時間不是個問題，但名額 （比方說，如果幾何是建立一次，並且接著快取）。Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached). 通常會產生較小的輸出，比。Typically, produces smaller output than . - 將圖案或路徑動畫中使用產生的幾何和不提供所需的外框。The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and does not provide the desired outline. ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features A是一種物件。A is a type of object. 如需功能，例如凍結和複製，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For information about features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
